title: Introduction to Python Programming
description: Learn Python programming language from scratch. This course covers basic syntax, data types, control structures, and more.

title: Web Development Fundamentals
description: Master the basics of web development including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Build your first website from scratch.

title: Data Science Essentials
description: An introduction to data science concepts and tools. Learn data analysis, visualization, and manipulation using Python and libraries like Pandas and Matplotlib.

title: Mobile App Development with React Native
description: Build cross-platform mobile apps using React Native framework. Learn to create responsive and dynamic mobile applications.

title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
description: An introduction to machine learning algorithms and techniques. Understand supervised and unsupervised learning, regression, classification, and clustering.

title: Advanced JavaScript Concepts
description: Deep dive into advanced JavaScript topics such as closures, prototypes, asynchronous programming, and ES6 features.

title: Cyber-security Basics
description: An overview of cybersecurity fundamentals including network security, cryptography, ethical hacking, and best practices.

title: Graphic Design for Beginners
description: Learn the basics of graphic design including color theory, typography, layout design, and creating digital artwork using Adobe Creative Suite.

title: Introduction to Blockchain Technology
description: Understand the fundamentals of blockchain technology, cryptocurrencies, smart contracts, and decentralized applications.
